credit_line: Gift of Tibor Kalman/ M & co.
title: Maira Kalman: Roarr Calder's Circus
description: Maira Kalman's narrative and Donatella Brun's photographs together imagine the lives of the circus performers created by Alexander Calder in his mixed media work, the Circus. In 1970, the Circus was installed in the lobbby of The Whitney Museum of American Art, where performances were held for many years. The work was purchased by the Whitney in 1982.
name: Book
